season_of_use: Planned opening is June 6, 2025. Campground use is by reservation only. Reservable dates are released 30 days in advance.
fee_info: No fees are required for this site
directions: Take Highway 89 southeast from Graeagle, California a couple miles.  Proceed south on Gold Lake Highway for 10 miles to Gold Lake.  Take the Gold Lake 4X4 road to the campground. 4-wheel drive and high clearance is required.
